sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"抛，投，掷"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: throw, cast, fling, heave, hurl, pitch, toss
means: throw ： 普通用词，使用广泛，仅指用力抛掷，不涉及动作方式或感情色彩。
cast常可与throw互换，指迅速扔出一个重量较轻的物体。
fling ： 指用力投掷，或因感情激动而粗暴地或漫无目的地扔东西。
heave ： 指把重物举起后扔出。
hurl ： 通常指用力投掷，动作迅猛，所投掷的距离也较远。
pitch ： 指随意地、轻轻地掷或扔，侧重方向性和有明确的目标。
toss ： 指无什么目的地、轻轻地、随意地掷或扔，所扔掷的东西一般都比较轻。

sentence.Network_en: It took only one heave to hurl him into the river.
sentence.Network_cn: 只一推，就把他推进了河里。

sentence.Network_en: The best cure for unhappiness is to hurl yourself into your work.
sentence.Network_cn: 医治愁苦的最好办法就是全身心地投入工作.

sentence.Network_en: When you get to the top, hurl the rope down, will you ?
sentence.Network_cn: 你到了顶上把绳子扔下来好 吗 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... humidity n. 湿度 hurl v. 猛投，猛掷 hurricane n. 飓风.
职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... hunter 猎人 hurl 用力投掷 hurricane 龙卷风，暴风(雨).
大学英语六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... humidity n. 湿度 hurl v. 猛投，猛掷 hurricane n. 飓风.
NK-words2 - 博客的日志 - 网易博客 ... hungry 饥饿的，渴望的 hurl 猛投，力掷；大声叫骂 hurricane 飓风.

list.abs: 大声_英文_英语_大声用英语怎么说_翻译_读音... ... squawk 大声抱怨 hurl reproaches 大声斥责 thunder 大声道出.
hurds 粗亚麻hurling pump 旋转泵-
hurds 粗亚麻hurl barrow 双轮手推车hurling pump 旋转泵
...在Yosemite和其他地方,他聚集了一群攀岩者来尝试他的这项新运动,有时被称为,躯体投掷,body hurling,或者,受控制的自由坠落,(controlled free falling).  ,当我试过一次.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: probably imitative, but corresponding in form and partly in sense with Low German hurreln

entry.def: If you hurl something, you throw it violently and with a lot of force.

example.ex: Groups of angry youths hurled stones at police...
example.tran: 成群结伙愤怒的年轻人朝警察投掷石块。

example.ex: One prisoner set fire to rags and hurled them into the courtyard...
example.tran: 一名囚犯将破布点着，扔进院子。

entry.def: If you hurl abuse or insults at someone, you shout insults at them aggressively.

example.ex: How would you handle being locked in the back of a cab while the driver hurled abuse at you?
example.tran: 如果你被锁在出租车后座上而且还遭到司机的无礼谩骂，你会怎么办？

auth_sentence.content: The tears of another hypocrite make me want to hurl.
auth_sentence.res_content: The tears of another hypocrite make me want to hurl.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The tears of another hypocrite make me want to hurl.

auth_sentence.content: Solar Flares and CME's hurl radiation towards our planet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Solar Flares and CME's hurl radiation towards our planet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Solar Flares and CME's hurl radiation towards our planet.

auth_sentence.content: The most creative spaces are those which hurl us together.
auth_sentence.res_content: The most creative spaces are those which hurl us together.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The most creative spaces are those which hurl us together.

Sentence.sentence: Talent,charm,and an exceptional work ethic have rarely hurled any one of world's most successful entertainment icons and the first African-American female billionaire.

Each burning season in the Amazon, fires deliberately set by frontier settlers and developers hurl up almost half a billion metric tons of carbon a year, placing Brazil among the top five contributors to greenhouse gases in the world.

sentences.en: The young track and field athlete could already hurl the discus 60 yards.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻的田径运动员已能把铁饼掷60码远。

sentences.en: He hurled curses at the unfortunate man who had made the mistake.
sentences.cn: 他对着这个犯了错误的可怜人大声叫骂。

jushi.english: The young track and field athlete could already hurl the discus 60 yards.
jushi.chinese: 这个年轻的田径运动员已能把铁饼投掷60码远。

jushi.english: I went to his desk, took all his books, and hurled them out of the window.
jushi.chinese: 我走到他的书桌旁,抓起他所有的书猛地掷到窗外。
